title: Excellent Location and great hotel
text:
We stayed here on a weekend break and were certainly impressed. The staff were most helpful (especially Corinne on the conceirge desk), the room was great, comfortable, clean and spacious, and the location was amzaing - right in the heart of Time Square on Broadway. Only slight downside was the prices in the bar. As someone who is used to Spain, Portugal or France where a bottle of wine costs less than â‚¬5, paying $26 for two glasses is a little bit of a shock.
Overall though a great hotel and great experience
